WorkItem.Description: Hello, some Items, purchasable for emblems of frost, are listed in the wrong place; they are described as "purchasable with XX [Emblem of Frost] and XXgXXsXXc", and appear as fraction reputation loot, not as special currency loot, which is not correct. I attached an image to make clear what I mean ... my English sucks.
WorkItem.Summary: Some Items listed in the wrong place

Comments.Message:
So this is item 50984 'Gloves of Ambivalence' : http://www.wowhead.com/item=50984
It's only supposed to have a cost of 60 Emblem of Frost, not gold too

Refresh the item and see if the money part drops off
